sense.def: Alternative Writing meng yan 夢魘 , hao yan 好魘 , cu yan 卒魘 , yan mei 魘魅 , nightmare seduction-specter; gui yan 鬼魘 , demonic nightmare. Pathological Condition of bad dreams with a feeling of being pressed down by demonic beings and finding it difficult to breath. Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 Substance Entry she xiang 麝香：久服除邪，不夢寤魘寐 , “Ingested over an extended period of time it will eliminate evil, and prevent awaking from nightmares ”.
